00024 #ifndef LUABIND_ADOPT_POLICY_HPP_INCLUDED
00025 #define LUABIND_ADOPT_POLICY_HPP_INCLUDED

00027 #include <luabind/config.hpp>
00028 #include <luabind/wrapper_base.hpp>
00029 #include <luabind/detail/policy.hpp>
00030 #include <luabind/back_reference_fwd.hpp>
00031 #include <luabind/wrapper_base.hpp>
00032 #include <boost/type_traits/is_polymorphic.hpp>
00033 
00034 namespace luabind { namespace detail 
00035 {
00036     template <class T>
00037     void adjust_backref_ownership(T* ptr, mpl::true_)
00038     {
00039         if (wrap_base* p = dynamic_cast<wrap_base*>(ptr))
00040         {
00041             wrapped_self_t& wrapper = wrap_access::ref(*p);
00042             wrapper.get(wrapper.state());
00043             wrapper.m_strong_ref.set(wrapper.state());
00044         }
00045     }
00046 
00047     inline void adjust_backref_ownership(void*, mpl::false_)
00048     {}
00049 
00050         template<class Direction = lua_to_cpp>
00051     struct adopt_pointer : pointer_converter
00052         {
00053                 typedef adopt_pointer type;
00054 
00055         int const consumed_args(...)
00056         {
00057             return 1;
00058         }
00059 
00060                 template<class T>
00061                 T* apply(lua_State* L, by_pointer<T>, int index)
00062                 {
00063             T* ptr = pointer_converter::apply(
00064                 L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(T*), index);
00065 
00066             object_rep* obj = static_cast<object_rep*>(
00067                 lua_touserdata(L, index));
00068             obj->release();
00069 
00070             adjust_backref_ownership(ptr, boost::is_polymorphic<T>());
00071 
00072             return ptr;
00073                 }
00074 
00075                 template<class T>
00076                 int match(lua_State* L, by_pointer<T>, int index)
00077                 {
00078             return pointer_converter::match(
00079                 L, LUABIND_DECORATE_TYPE(T*), index);
00080                 }
00081 
00082                 template<class T>
00083                 void converter_postcall(lua_State*, T, int) {}
00084         };
00085 
00086         template<>
00087         struct adopt_pointer<cpp_to_lua>
00088         {
00089                 typedef adopt_pointer type;
00090 
00091                 template<class T>
00092                 void apply(lua_State* L, T* ptr)
00093                 {
00094                         if (ptr == 0) 
00095                         {
00096                                 lua_pushnil(L);
00097                                 return;
00098                         }
00099 
00100                         // if there is a back_reference, then the
00101                         // ownership will be removed from the
00102                         // back reference and put on the lua stack.
00103                         if (luabind::move_back_reference(L, ptr))
00104                                 return;
00105 
00106             make_instance(L, std::auto_ptr<T>(ptr));
00107                 }
00108         };
00109 
00110         template<int N>
00111 //      struct adopt_policy : converter_policy_tag
00112         struct adopt_policy : conversion_policy<N>
00113         {
00114 //              BOOST_STATIC_CONSTANT(int, index = N);
00115 
00116                 static void precall(lua_State*, const index_map&) {}
00117                 static void postcall(lua_State*, const index_map&) {}
00118 
00119                 struct only_accepts_nonconst_pointers {};
00120 
00121                 template<class T, class Direction>
00122                 struct apply
00123                 {
00124                         typedef luabind::detail::is_nonconst_pointer<T> is_nonconst_p;
00125                         typedef typename boost::mpl::if_<is_nonconst_p, adopt_pointer<Direction>, only_accepts_nonconst_pointers>::type type;
00126                 };
00127         };
00128 
00129 }}

00131 namespace luabind
00132 {
00133         template<int N>
00134         detail::policy_cons<detail::adopt_policy<N>, detail::null_type> 
00135         adopt(LUABIND_PLACEHOLDER_ARG(N))
00136         { 
00137                 return detail::policy_cons<detail::adopt_policy<N>, detail::null_type>(); 
00138         }
